Section.name: About Alva's Institute of Engineering and Technology
Section.description:
Alva’s Institute of Engineering & Technology (AIET), Mangalore is a premier Engineering Institute of Alva’s Education Foundation established in the year 2008. The main aim of the AIET is to set up a centre for excellence by offering world class technical education and research opportunities of very high standards and making the students technologically the best and ethically strong.
Alva’s Institute of Engineering & Technology COMEDK Cutoff 2024 is out. The table below shows the cutoff rank for GM (General Merit) category under Round 1.
